description:
Looking After the HouseThere is a day when Bunji and Fumi are looking after their home until the late afternoon. Both of them eat pudding, play games, and have fun by themselves, but Fumi starts to feel a bit lonely...
To Be Continued
Mom continues to be disappointed with Bunji`s poor results. That is when the relaxed education spirit appears. When the spirit says that a good university and good job don`t mean everything, Mom can`t argue, but...
Playing With Snow
There is a day with a big snowstorm. Dad invites Bunji and Fumi to a snowball fight, but the two of them are not interested. That`s when Dad gets a hold of Mom, who is stuck with her manga ideas, for a change of atmosphere, and gets her to play in the snowball fight, but...
Thank You
When Mom was a child,she wanted to be an adult. It seemed to her at the time that she would be able to doanything she wanted and could go anywhere she wanted. But time just doesn`t pass at all...
Source: crunchyroll
